QuestData.Title: The Uninvited Guest
QuestData.Description: While you were dealing with the pirates, I noticed the Trade Prince slip upstairs. He's up on the balcony at the top of the stairs.$B$B$n, I think he's the one that sent the pirates.$B$B<Sassy cringes.>$B$BYou'd better get up there A.S.A.P.! You wouldn't want to keep him waiting.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Trade Prince Gallywix upstairs at the KTC Headquarters main building on Kezan.
QuestData.RewardText: Well, well, well, if it isn't my wayward protege, $g Mr. : Ms.; $n.$B$BI'm hurt and disappointed. You didn't send me an invitation to your little party out there. Sorry about the crashers... you know how pirates can be.$B$BSo, shall we get down to business?
